GitHubApiData.name: BrLP
GitHubApiData.description: [MICCAI, 2024] (Oral, RU @ MedIA Best Paper Award) Official implementation of the Brain Latent Progression (BrLP) method from "Enhancing Spatiotemporal Disease Progression Models via Latent Diffusion and Prior Knowledge"

TranslatedDescriptions.zh-CN: [MICCAI, 2024]（口头报告，MedIA最佳论文奖提名）“通过潜在扩散和先验知识增强时空疾病进展模型”中脑潜在进展（BrLP）方法的官方实现
TranslatedDescriptions.ja: [MICCAI, 2024]（口頭発表、MedIAベストペーパー賞受賞）「潜在拡散と事前知識による時空間疾患進行モデルの強化」におけるBrain Latent Progression（BrLP）手法の公式実装
TranslatedDescriptions.ko: [MICCAI, 2024] (구두 발표, MedIA 최우수 논문상 수상) "잠재 확산 및 사전 지식을 통한 시공간 질병 진행 모델 향상" 논문의 Brain Latent Progression (BrLP) 공식 구현체입니다.
TranslatedDescriptions.en: [MICCAI, 2024] (Oral, RU @ MedIA Best Paper Award) Official implementation of the Brain Latent Progression (BrLP) method from "Enhancing Spatiotemporal Disease Progression Models via Latent Diffusion and Prior Knowledge"
TranslatedDescriptions.fr: [MICCAI, 2024] (Présentation orale, RU @ Prix du meilleur article MedIA) Implémentation officielle de la méthode Brain Latent Progression (BrLP) issue de "Enhancing Spatiotemporal Disease Progression Models via Latent Diffusion and Prior Knowledge".
TranslatedDescriptions.es: [MICCAI, 2024] (Oral, RU @ MedIA Best Paper Award) Implementación oficial del método Brain Latent Progression (BrLP) de "Enhancing Spatiotemporal Disease Progression Models via Latent Diffusion and Prior Knowledge".
